updates.title: Majsoul emotes (Update 2025-10-22)
updates.description: New package with all, upscaled majsoul emotes.

updates.title: Change buttons (Update 2025-10-22)
updates.description: Replaces 'Riichi', 'Ron' and 'Tsumo' prompts with 'Free Sex', 'Rekt' and 'Skill' respectively. Fixed for the Gintama collab, as they added a new gamemode which broke it

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 2025-10-22)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Updated for the Gintama collab

updates.title: Sanma book 1 (The Secrets to Three-Player Mahjong) - Owata
updates.description: 三人麻雀の極意 (The Secrets to Three-Player Mahjong) is a book about push-fold judgment and decisions when playing sanma written by sanma tenhoui Owata. Assumes basic knowledge of mahjong and sanma. Features examples of hands and WWYDs to practice decision-making in the latter half of the book.

updates.title: Double Your Safe Tiles! Mahjong Discard Reading Drills - Hirasawa Genki
updates.description: A comprehensive course on reading and responding to open hands. Detailed explanations accompany 80 3D WWYDs which highlight using calls and discards to deduce opponent yaku, value, progress, and likely waits.

updates.title: Frequently Appearing in Actual Games! Mahjong Lectures - Yuusei
updates.description: Various lectures on hand-building, adjusting play based on the point distribution, push-fold, and reading discards to infer hand development, blocks, and probable waits.

updates.title: Added Valentines 2025 to tourneys
updates.description: Added the valentines tourney. If the repo forgot a tourney hosted, please post it in the thread!!

updates.title: /mjg/ userscripts and userstyles
updates.description: Uploaded some userscripts (emote replacer for /vg/ and FC2) and a userstyle (4han theme) that were contributed by various Anons.

updates.title: 4han.moe
updates.description: TODAY WE ARE GATHERED HERE TO MOURN, for our dear site, our slice of paradise, gone too soon... May we see each other again when the 4chan mods inevitably fuck up again

updates.title: Majsoul character sprites (Update 2025-02-26)
updates.description: Contains all majsoul character sprites.

updates.title: Ichihime 3D model
updates.description: No further description needed

updates.title: Shin Janki DVD transcode
updates.description: Shin Janki Movies provided by anon

updates.title: Majsoul character voices (Update 2025-01-21)
updates.description: Complete package with all character voice lines.

updates.title: WWYD4 (Update 2024-12-27)
updates.description: 202 foundational WWYDs which pair well with WWYD3 and Riichi Book 1. Questions hammer core concepts like 5-block theory, two-head theory, common complex shapes, and tradeoffs between wait and value. Much easier than WWYD1 and WWYD2.

updates.title: Tournament Hosting Guide (Update 2024-12-27)
updates.description: Everything you need to know to host your own /mjg/ tourney. Covers creating the doc/sheet, the MJS tournament management interface, streaming, recording, and expectations.

updates.title: Illegal Mahjong
updates.description: 4 player Tonpu game where you can 'cheat' in order to win. Basically you're an ojou-sama whose father's company has gone bankrupt and you must repay the debts by playing mahjong and sex if you lose. You'll have to win without cheating if you want to get the good ending but beware, the AI >damas.

updates.title: April's fools 2024
updates.description: Ichihime sprites for April's fools 2024

updates.title: 100 Latest Techniques of Strong Players - Hidehito Higa
updates.description: A collection of 100 WWYDs which include the full bayko. Expert Tenhou players provide their choices and explain the reasoning behind their decisions. Topics include push/fold, riichi/dama, calling, folding, and considerations for placement.

updates.title: Replace Hannah with Mokou mod (Update 2024-02-28)
updates.description: Updated with new outfit + emotes

updates.title: /mjg/ Christmas pack 2023 (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description:
Christmas mod containing character sprites and emote edits from the thread.
Version with waifu2x emotes here

updates.title: Umineko Sound effects + Music (Update 2023-11-21)
updates.description: Replaces regular sound effects and music in majsoul to Umineko sound effects and music! (Hopefully) fixed the music tracks. Updated for the new menu, match and riichi music. I couldn't test everything so bitch in the thread if something's broken and I'll look out for it

updates.title: Replace Hannah with Mokou mod
updates.description: Replace the f*rry with a cute Mokou. Voice not included

updates.title: Touhou Unreal Mahjong 4N character tier list
updates.description: Extensive list of all characters, their powers and how well they perform on each stage (in anon's opinion).

updates.title: Touhou Unreal Mahjong 4N Cracked
updates.description: Cracked client for the touhou mahjong game with superpowers and all of that. Supports multiplayer and already contains the English patch.

updates.title: Riichi city emotes (Update 2023-10-11)

updates.title: Kaavi's 8ball fortune tourney!
updates.description: Congratulations to Bodoque for winning the Kaavi 8ball tourney! Luckshitter!

updates.title: No Reddit Fetish (Update 2023-08-16)
updates.description: Removes every trace of the reddit fetish from the game.

updates.title: Riichi Cooking in Another World 0.2
updates.description: More ranks, more wwyds: Novice, Adept and Expert rank are implemented. Endgame wwyd modes: Normal, Blitz (10 seconds each) and Rush (60 seconds total). Novice test: only requires 4 correct answers out of 6 now. Cooking game: should calculate mangan value properly now. Also more events and some changes to other stuff like graphic and audio.

updates.title: 3RD >ANNUAL /MJG/ QUESTIONNAIRE
updates.description:
Yet again another autistic aggregation of /mjg/'s opinions and experiences. It's over 3 hours long, holy fucking autism. Also, it's separated in 3 parts.
Part 1: General questions and thread culture
Part 2: /mjg/'s projects, league and tourneys
Part 3: IRL stuff and memes

updates.title: CityLogs
updates.description: Convert your Riichi City logs to tenhou.net/6 JSON format. Analyze converted logs with Mortal or Naga.

updates.title: the /mjg/ WWYD project
updates.description: every rank rates your submitted wwyd. find the form in the thread to submit your wwyd

updates.title: /mjg/ League 4
updates.description: WINNER: DEADϟHAND! Congratulations to the boomers, and to everyone who participated and did their best!
